001package imagingbook.common.sift;
002
003import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogHide;
004import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogLabel;
005import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftDetector.NeighborhoodType3D;
006import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
007
008/**
009 * Default parameters; a (usually modified) instance of this class
010 * may be passed to the constructor of {@link SiftDetector}.
011 */
012public class SiftParameters implements ParameterBundle<SiftDetector> {
013        
014        /** Set true to output debug information. */
015        @DialogHide
016        public boolean DEBUG = false;
017        
018        /** Type of neigborhood used for peak detection in 3D scale space. */
019        @DialogLabel("Neighborhood for 3D peak detection")
020        public NeighborhoodType3D nhType = NeighborhoodType3D.NH18;
021        
022        /** Sampling scale (nominal smoothing level of the input image). */
023        @DialogLabel("Nominal sampling scale (sigmaS)")
024        public double sigmaS = 0.5;
025        
026        /** Base scale at level 0 (base smoothing). */
027        @DialogLabel("Base scale at level 0 (sigma0)")
028        public double sigma0 = 1.6;
029        
030        /** Number of octaves in Gaussian/DoG scale space. */
031        @DialogLabel("Number of scale space octaves (P)")
032        public int P = 4;
033        
034        /** Scale steps (levels) per octave. */
035        @DialogLabel("Scale levels per octaves (Q)")
036        public int Q = 3;
037        
038        /** Minimum magnitude required in DoG peak detection (abs. value). */
039        @DialogLabel("Minimum detection magnitude (tMag)")
040        public double tMag = 0.01;
041        
042        
043        /** Minimum DoG magnitude required for extrapolated peaks (abs. value). */
044        @DialogLabel("Minimum peak magnitude (tPeak)")
045        public double tPeak = tMag;
046        
047        /** Minimum difference to all neighbors in DoG peak detection (max. 0.0005). */
048        @DialogLabel("Minimum neigborhood difference (tExtrm)")
049        public double tExtrm = 0.0;
050        
051        /** Maximum number of iterations for refining the position of a key point. */
052        @DialogLabel("Maximum position refinement steps (nRefine)")
053        public int nRefine = 5;
054        
055        /** Maximum principal curvature ratio used to eliminate line-like structures (3..10). */
056        @DialogLabel("Maximum principal curvature ratio (rhoMax=3..10)")
057        public double rhoMax = 10.0;
058        
059        /** Number of orientation bins in the feature descriptor (angular resolution). */
060        @DialogLabel("Number of orientation bins (nOrient)")
061        public int nOrient = 36;
062        
063        /** Number of smoothing steps applied to the orientation histogram. */
064        @DialogLabel("Histogram smoothing steps (nSmooth)")
065        public int nSmooth = 2;
066        
067        /** Minimum value in orientation histogram for dominant orientations (rel. to max. entry). */
068        @DialogLabel("Minimum value in orientation histogram (tDomOr)")
069        public double tDomOr = 0.8;
070        
071        /** Number of spatial descriptor bins along each x/y axis. */
072        @DialogLabel("Number of spatial descriptor bins (nSpat)")
073        public int nSpat = 4;
074        
075        /** Number of angular descriptor bins. */
076        @DialogLabel("Number of angular descriptor bins (nAngl)")
077        public int nAngl = 8;
078        
079        /** Maximum value in normalized feature vector (0.2 recommended by Lowe). */
080        @DialogLabel("Maximum normalized feature value (tFclip)")
081        public double tFclip = 0.2;
082        
083        /** Scale factor for converting normalized features to byte values in [0,255]. */
084        @DialogLabel("Feature integer conversion scale (sFscale)")
085        public double sFscale = 512.0;
086        
087        /** Spatial size factor of descriptor (relative to feature scale). */
088        @DialogLabel("Descriptor display size factor (sDesc)")
089        public double sDesc = 10.0;
090        
091//      /** Set true to sort detected keypoints by response magnitude. */
092//      @DialogLabel("Sort keypoints by score magnitude")
093//      public boolean sortKeyPoints = true;
094}
